/* SELECT getMenuIdByMenuUrl */ WITH RECURSIVE CTS AS (SELECT h.TREE_ID , h.PARENT_ID , h.MENU_ID FROM wcsdb.TB_COM_MENU_MST h WHERE MENU_URL = #{menuUrl} UNION ALL SELECT b.TREE_ID , b.PARENT_ID , b.MENU_ID FROM wcsdb.TB_COM_MENU_MST b INNER JOIN CTS c ON b.TREE_ID = c.PARENT_ID)
SELECT k.MENU_ID FROM CTS k ;

/* SELECT getByTreeId */ SELECT MENU_ID , MENU_NM , MENU_DESC , MENU_LVL , MENU_TYPE , MENU_URL , MENU_ICON , TREE_ID , PARENT_ID , USER_LVL , USE_YN , SORT_SEQ , MAIN_SHOW_ICON , REG_ID , REG_DT , UPD_ID , UPD_DT FROM wcsdb.TB_COM_MENU_MST a WHERE a.TREE_ID = #{parentId} ;
